oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON STABILITY OF APPROXIMATE SOLUTIONS OF MINIMIZATION PROBLEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHUNMUGARAJ, P
PAI, DV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: convex-functions
convergence
continuity
centers
sets
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we investigate stability of the optimal value function and the set of approximate solutions of constrained minimization problems under various perturbations of the objective function and the constraint set. Some interesting applications to approximation theory are also explored.
